rukus.text: 23|1|saphal ho gaye eemaan vaale.
23|2|jo apanee namaazon mein vineet rahane vaale hain.
23|3|aur jo vyarth[1] se vimukh rahane vaale hain.
23|4|tatha jo zakaat dene vaale hain.
23|5|aur jo apane guptaangon kee raksha karane vaale hain.
23|6|parantu apanee patniyon tatha apane svaamitv mein aayee daasiyon se, to vahee nindit nahin hain.
23|7|phir jo isake atirikt chaahen, to vahee ullanghanakaaree hain.
23|8|aur jo apanee dharoharon tatha vachan ka paalan karane vaale hain.
23|9|tatha jo apanee namaazon kee raksha karane vaale hain.
23|10|yahee uttaraadhikaaree hain.
23|11|jo uttaraadhikaaree honge firdaus[1] ke, jisamen ve sadaavaasee honge.
23|12|aur hamane utpann kiya hai manushy ko mittee ke saar[1] se.
23|13|phir hamane use veery banaakar rakh diya ek surakshit sthaan[1] mein.

23|14|phir badal diya veery ko jame hue rakt mein, phir hamane use maans ka lothada bana diya, phir hamane lothade mein haddiyaan banaayeen, phir hamane pahana diya haddiyon ko maans, phir use ek any roop mein utpann kar diya. to shubh hai allaah, jo sabase achchhee utpatti karane vaala hai.
23|15|phir tumasab isake pashchaat avashy marane vaale ho.
23|16|phir nishchay tumasab (pralay) ke din jeevit kiye jaoge.
23|17|aur hamane bana diye tumhaare oopar saat aakaash aur ham utpatti se achet nahin[1] hain.
23|18|aur hamane aakaash se uchit maatra mein paanee barasaaya aur use dharatee mein rok diya tatha ham use vilupt kar dene par nishchay saamarthyavaan hain.
23|19|phir hamane upaja diye tumhaare lie us (paanee) ke dvaara khajooron tatha angooron ke baag, tumhaare lie usamen bahut-se phal hain aur useemen se tum khaate ho.
23|20|tatha vrksh jo nikalata hai saina parvat se, jo tel lie ugata hai tatha saalan hai khaane vaalon ke lie.

23|21|aur vaastav mein, tumhaare lie pashuon mein ek shiksha hai, ham tumhen pilaate hain, usamen se, jo unake peton mein[1] hai tatha tumhaare lie unamen any bahut-se laabh hain aur unamen se kuchh ko tum khaate ho.
23|22|tatha unapar aur naavon par tum savaar kiye jaate ho.
